h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: Give it to him, and he’ll give you a cryptic message about the Realm of Gold located where the sun sets, but it’s not a lot to go on. He also mentions the Yellow Wind Guai said “our senior brother gave me a piece of gold. I’ll need it here when the time’s right.” The Boar thinks the time is right to try it now.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
Give it to him, and he’ll give you a cryptic message about the Realm of Gold located where the sun sets, but it’s not a lot to go on. He also mentions the Yellow Wind Guai said “our senior brother gave me a piece of gold. I’ll need it here when the time’s right.” The Boar thinks the time is right to try it now.
